vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐπερώτ-ημα,
Ionic dialect ἐπειρ-, ατος, τό, question, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__2 answer to inquiry put to higher authority: hence, sanction, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
__3 = Latin stipulatio, PCair. Preis.1.16 [Refs 2nd c.AD+]: hence probably, pledge, [Refs].
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
pledge; some translate "request, appeal"
primarily an interrogation, question; in NT profession, pledge, appeal 1Pet. 3:21*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: promesa, respuesta ; apelación ; quizá promesa o compromiso para con Dios proveniente de una conciencia limpia (1PE.3:21)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: câu hỏi / lời hứa. Xem G1905
